headline: L3Harris Red Wolf Contract Highlights Precision Strike And Valuation Outlook
summary: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) secured a major U.S. Navy contract to develop Red Wolf precision-strike vehicles for the Marine Corps. The Red Wolf program is intended to deliver long-range systems capable of engaging moving targets at extended ranges. The award expands L3Harris's role in advanced weapons and targeting solutions for U.S. defense customers. L3Harris Technologies, a key contractor in defense electronics and mission systems, is now set to work on the Red Wolf precision-strike...
